alert.note: Alert for Central Walton; Holmes; Jackson; North Walton; Washington (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 13 at 4:58PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT NORTHWESTERN JACKSON...CENTRAL WALTON...HOLMES AND NORTHERN WASHINGTON COUNTIES THROUGH 445 PM CDT... At 358 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 9 miles west of Graceville to 9 miles north of Eglin Air Force Base. Movement was southeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Locations impacted include... Chipley, Graceville, De Funiak Springs, Bonifay, Eglin Air Force Base, Union, Live Oak, Ponce De Leon, Caryville, Esto, Westville, Campbellton, Noma, Oakwood Hills, Whitehead Crossroads, Cerrogordo, Gritney, Rock Hill, Pleasant Ridge, and Knox Hill. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. These storms may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.

area.areaDesc: Central Walton; Holmes; Jackson; North Walton; Washington
